Description: Blue glazed composition funerary scarab with ridged elytra; flat undecorated base with suspension holes at top and bottom.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.58; N. Strudwick, Masterpieces of Ancient Egypt, London 2006, pp. 280-1.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Mrs Marion Whiteford Acworth JP
